name: Australie
tagline: The agency that sees things differently.
description:
Everything has changed since the creation of Australie in 1984. One thing that hasn't changed are the three simple principles that have always guided our work.
 

Our only priority is the public, so we propose intelligent and sensitive ideas. An idea spreads. So, the media, digital and social expertise are mobilized upstream of the reflection so that they are vectors of creativity and efficiency. A brand is a style. So our campaigns are very specific to the companies for which we work and therefore very different from each other.
